reviewDescription: Perfect bottle to bring to stadiums that don't allow glass or metal beverage containers that's equal to 600ml. Only used once & it met expectations.
I've been using it for over a year now. Excellent quality, great size, easy to take with you anywhere and anytime.
Love these bottles, I have purchased many for my family. Easy to clean! Slim and fit in car cup holders.
I loved these. Durable and easy to use. Lockable to prevent leaks

The mouthpiece is rough and uncomfortable on the lips. I think that alone deserves one star. The color and feel of the actual bottle is nice and hasn’t appeared to leak. Won’t be using again, the mouth piece is that bad.
